<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/rewards/v1/claim-proof"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



GenerateClaimProof generates a proof for the given earner address and tokens for claiming
tokens against the RewardsCoordinator

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"earnerAddress":{"type":"string"},"rootIndex":{"type":"object","properties":{"value":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},"title":"Int64Value"},"tokens":{"type":"string"}},"required":["root_index"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"proof":{"type":"object","properties":{"earnerIndex":{"type":"integer","format":"uint32"},"earnerLeaf":{"type":"object","properties":{"earner":{"type":"string"},"earnerTokenRoot":{"type":"string","format":"byte"}},"title":"EarnerLeaf"},"earnerTreeProof":{"type":"string","format":"byte"},"root":{"type":"string","format":"byte"},"rootIndex":{"type":"integer","format":"uint32"},"tokenIndices":{"type":"integer","format":"uint32"},"tokenLeaves":{"type":"object","properties":{"cumulativeEarnings":{"type":"string"},"token":{"type":"string"}},"title":"TokenLeaf"},"tokenTreeProofs":{"type":"string","format":"byte"}},"required":["earner_leaf"],"title":"Proof"}},"required":["proof"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
